import './post.css' import { MoreHoriz} from "@material-ui/icons" import {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import Axios from 'axios' export default function Post({post, user}) { Axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState({ username: "user" }) const [liked, setLiked] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { console.log(post) Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/users/query/${post.userId}`) .then((response) => { setUserProfile(response.data); }) }, []) return (
{userProfile.username}
{liked ? : }
{post.likes.length} likes
{userProfile.username}

{post.desc}

View all 14 comments
5 HOURS AGO
{/**POST BOTTOM */}
) }
